projects.title: Event Management API
projects.description: A RESTful API built with Express and PostgreSQL, designed for managing users, events, and subscriptions. This project includes JWT-based authentication, role-based access control, and CRUD operations with pagination. It also features a database installation and seeding process, along with comprehensive API documentation using Swagger.

projects.title: Fast Pages CMS
projects.description: A full content management system built with Node.js, Express, and Mustache for server-side templating. The system includes secure user authentication, content management, and database integration with PostgreSQL.

projects.title: Term.ooo Solver
projects.description: A solver for the popular word-guessing game Termooo, built in Python as part of a study about web scraping with Selenium lib. The app implements algorithms to analyze word history and suggest optimal guesses.

projects.title: Typespeed
projects.description: Jogo de digitação baseado em React, onde o jogador deve digitar as palavras corretamente dentro de um tempo limite.
